name: Ameerah
description: I’m honest, charming, tender lady who has romantic dreams and kind heart. I am soft and careful. I’m looking only for serious relationship with honest, caring, romantic gentlman with a good sense of humour. I look for an individuality in the first place. There has to be something that differs him from others, that’s it, a flair. . . The person I’m looking for is intelligent, with a great sense of humour, honest, caring, reliable, confident, strong-willed and many-sided. I don’t want him to be Mister Perfect or a sickly sweet person, there should be definitely some spice. . . If u have a good heart, quick mind, sense of humour and serious intention, I would be happy to get to know you.
